verbose_text: High MHC class II expression in macrophages correlates with a transcription profile of classically activated (M1) cells that are associated with inflammatory responses, whereas low class II expression is found on cells that express genes observed in alternatively activated macrophages (M2 group) that are involved in tissue remodeling and angiogenesis.
